page.title: 19The Steyning Museum
page.content: The Steyning Museum building is over one hundred years old and is full of lots of exciting things that are very old. There are two rooms,the back one full of lots of maps showing where the sea used to come right up to Steyning. The first map shows where the sea used to cover Steyning and then picture by picture the sea subsides.The museum is also full of very old coins from the 16thC. By the door there is a book in which you fill in your name,address and what you thought of the place.There are other things also like a pair of old shoes in very good condition. There is a piece of writing which is very neat and decorated nicely.
